channel.title: Taking A Long Drive - Andrew Young (Hip-Hop)
channel.description:
This track features a loop from the notmiles demo and some loops from the Sublab demo by Zeph. I used an 808 bass (panned to the left) and a sub-bass (panned to the right).
https://soundcloud.com/andrewyoung300/taking-a-long-drive
